items.sentence: Tom wasn\'t given the chance that you and I were.
Tom pointed to the floor near Mary\'s right foot.
Tom and Mary got married this year in the spring.
Tom and Mary hope their next child will be a boy.
Tom certainly knew what he was doing was illegal.
Tom crawled into bed and fell asleep immediately.
Three people are still missing and presumed dead.
Tom certainly isn\'t as bad as Mary claims he is.
Tom couldn\'t sleep at all because it was so hot.
Tom has been living in Boston since last October.
